facts.location: Hussain Medical Store, Village Bakhshan Khan, Tehsil Chishtian, District Bahawalnagar
facts.analysis_result: Did not conform to B.P. Standard due to suspended material and foreign particles

appellant.jurisdiction_challenge: Drug Court constituted under Drugs Act, 1976 had no jurisdiction to try offences under repealed Drugs Act, 1940
appellant.merits_challenge: Stocking sub-standard drugs without warranty is not punishable under Drugs Ordinance, 1976 or Drugs Act, 1976
appellant.mens_rea: Prosecution failed to prove intent; onus of proof wrongly shifted

respondent.general_clauses_act: Section 6(e) of General Clauses Act, 1897 allows prosecution for offences under repealed enactments

key_findings.jurisdiction: Drug Court under Drugs Act, 1976 lacked jurisdiction to try offences under Drugs Act, 1940
key_findings.procedural_law: Procedural changes affecting vested rights are not retrospective unless expressly stated
key_findings.penal_statutes: Penal statutes must be strictly construed in favor of the accused

judgment.decision: Conviction and sentence set aside; bail bond discharged
